Requirements and Rules: 
1. No sleeping in class & cell phones must be turned off. If phones ring in a quiz or an exam, five points will be deducted from the grade of tests.
2. Absence: Students are expected to attend the class ON TIME. 
(1) Being late by TEN minutes or more results in 2 point deduction from the “Attendance” grade. 
(2) Being late for more than TWENTY minutes equals one hour unexcused absence. One hour UNEXCUSED absence results in 4 points deduction.  
(3) For an absence to be excused, students need to submit compelling evidence of the gravity or unforseeability of the event causing the absence within ONE WEEK. 
(4) Students missing more than 5 hours will have a fail.
(5) Absence from a class is no excuse for not knowing the assignment and what has been discussed in that class. There will be NO MAKE-UP EXAM unless you have valid and official reasons for absence BEFOREHAND.
